name: DAYS END
description:
STORY:

Xonobia Virus spread around the country, everyone dies becuase of the infected zombies and some of them left the country and some of them survived and some of them got lost, and one of them was Chad, he wanted to get out of the country to survive and got involved with a ruthless gang called "Blackbirds". He helped them deliver weed to their headquaters and wanted to get out of the country with his brother that is lost too. A horror FPS experience that you're gonna get scared while playing alone, with lots of action and thriller, with low ammo. Play DAYS END Now!



CONTROLS:
⦁ W,A,S,D To Move
⦁ Space To Jump
⦁ Shift To Run
⦁ E To Interact
⦁ Q To Put Away Objects
⦁ 1,2,3 Or Scroll To Switch Between Weapons
⦁ Esc To Pause The Game
⦁ Right Click To Aim, Left Click To Shoot
⦁ Tab To Open Inventory
⦁ In The Loading Screen, When The Tips Are Hidden Showing, You Can Press Any Key To Continue To The Game.



Key Features:
  • Investigate Each House
  • Scary Horror Foggy Environment
  • Inventory System & Crafting
  • Monster Boss Fight
  • Full Controller Support
  • Challenging Zombies Shooting
  • Secret Easter Eggs
  • Steam Achievements!
